Question
========

A statistics professor suspects that the likelihood of passing the retake depends on several factors: including taking Canvast tests, listening to the slidecasts, and the number of hours spent studying the book. What analysis technique can she use to formally test her suspicions? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple logistic regression
* Multiple linear regression
* Factorial ANOVA
* ANCOVA
